description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Number of lines per page varies. Written in several scripts, mostly casual medium large naskh, in black ink. Dark cream paper with chain and laid lines visible. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals, counting the first flyleaf as fol. 1. Text 3 (Faṣl al-munāzaʻah) was copied on 25 Rabīʻ al-Ākhar 746 (fol. 16a).
author: Sharīshī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1294?-1368?
abstract: Collection of texts on fiqh and ḥadīth.
contents: 3. fol. 3b-8b: Fawāʼid fiqhīyah / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharīshī (d. 1368).
4. fol. 9a-12a: [Several short excerpts, quoting al-Shāmil, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Subkī, the Ṣiḥaḥ of [Ismāʻīl ibn Ḥammād] al-Jawharī].
5. fol. 12b-14b: Alghāz / Abū Yūsuf [Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Shaybānī (d. 804 or 5)].
6. fol. 15a: [Short quotation from Tāj al-Dīn [ʻAbd al-Wahhāb] al-Subkī].
7. fol. 16a-22a: Faṣl al-munāzaʻah fī taḥqīq kasr awāʼil al-afʻāl al-muḍāriʻah / Muḥammad ibn Yūnus Abū Zurʻah (d. 1348 or 9).
8. fol. 23a-29b: [Risālah fī al-ruwāt al-thiqāt. Selections] / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Dhahabī (d. 1348), abridgment by Muḥammad ibn Yūnus Abū Zurʻah (d. 1348 or 9).
10. fol. 32a-41b: Asmāʼ al-ṣaḥābah alladhīna ittafaqa ʻalá al-ikhrāj lahum aṣḥāb al-kutub al-sittah.
11. fol. 42a-52b: [Several paragraphs dealing mostly with legal matters, starting with a quotation from Sharaf al-Dīn al-Mursī (d. Rabīʻ al-Awwal 655/1257). Ibn ʻAqīl is also quoted (fol. 49b)].
extent: i, 51 leaves: paper ; 189 x 132 (160 x 112) mm. bound to 188 x 143 mm.
provenance: Waqf (see note on fol. 4a, 12b, etc.). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: Waqf (see note on fol. 4a, 12b, etc.). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Sharīshī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1294?-1368?
شريشي، محمد بن احمد
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Brown leather over paper pasteboard (visible). The upper and lower covers are similarly blind tooled with a central square pattern and an outer frame consisting of an s-shape running pattern and several fillets. Rebacked. Damaged.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
